message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer for the product is $1100000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm confident that this is a fair starting point.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. I hope we can reach an agreement that is satisfactory for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1050000. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. My counteroffer is $1080000. I believe this is a more reasonable price, considering the value the product brings to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me think about it and I'll come back to you shortly. In the meantime, I'd like to suggest a counteroffer of $1070000. I hope we can find common ground.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. My counteroffer is $1090000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise, considering the value the product brings to you.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1085000. I hope this will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1090000, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me. I'll do one more concession. My final counteroffer is $1090000, but I'm willing to go up to $1095000 if you're willing to meet me there. Let's see if we can close the deal.

Alice, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your effort in reaching a compromise. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1092500. I hope this will be acceptable to you and we can finalize the deal.

I've already given you a significant discount, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $1095000. My final offer is $1095000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options. I'm not willing to give away the product for less than this price.
